Name: SearchFilter
Description: SearchFilter is records selection input object and can be extended for specific scenarios. In WindnTrees application user is not required to implement multiple filters for every other user input rather just rely on SearchFilter and extend for specific needs.

Properties.Name: keys
Properties.Description: Collection of composite key required for object selection.

Properties.Name: keywords
Properties.Description: Collection of keywords for selecting records.

Properties.Name: options
Properties.Description: Collection of options for selecting records.

Properties.Name: checks
Properties.Description: Collection of checks for selecting records.

Properties.Name: descending
Properties.Description: Boolean value to select records in ascending or descending order.

Properties.Name: ascendings
Properties.Description: List of column names for selection records in ascending order.

Properties.Name: descendings
Properties.Description: List of column names for selecting records in descending order.

Properties.Name: starttime
Properties.Description: Starting time requried for selecting records.

Properties.Name: endtime
Properties.Description: End time required for selecting records.

Properties.Name: total
Properties.Description: Total records count requried for selecting limited number of records.
